Posts.Content: P23 wrote: I had three lumpectomies (1 + 2 re-excision) and did not have any difficulty with recovery but found myself suffering from stomach pain and nausea after the third surgery. My family doctor said it could be as a result of the anaesthesia and having three surgeries in about 2 months. Did anyone else have the same problems? Dx 5/27/2016, DCIS/IDC, Right, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stomach Pain after Lumpectomy P23 P23
